name: Paxton Parker

education.school: Central Montessori School in Richmond, VA
education.montessoriApproach: Independent time management, self-directed learning, critical thinking, and collaboration

academicInterests: Strong skills in time management, critical thinking, and collaboration

leadership.involvement: Active participant in group projects and peer learning in multi-age classroom (Grades 6–8)

achievements: Voted MVP in first season of travel soccer
athletics.schedule: 3 practices + 1 game per week, ~30 games per season (Spring–Fall)

athletics.details: Participates in swim meets, developed strong teamwork, discipline, and physical fitness

strengths: Well-rounded: academics, leadership, athletics, community service, and creative interests
